response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will significantly contribute to your success and satisfaction. I am offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000, aiming to provide you with an unparalleled opportunity to acquire such a high-quality item at a competitive rate. I trust this offer will be attractive and beneficial for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you and helping you achieve your goals with this outstanding product.", "product_price": 1200000}
